subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Donovan McNabb sprained his ankle in the second quarter of Philadelphia’s game against Miami. A. J. Feeley played well in relief, but Coach Andy Reid moved quickly to head off a quarterback controversy. “If Donovan’s healthy, he’s the quarterback,” Reid said. ... Receiver Santonio Holmes left the Steelers’ game against the Jets with an ankle injury and did not return. ... Jaguars linebacker Mike Peterson will be out indefinitely after breaking his right hand against the Chargers.
